CustomBehavior.Lua: i=GetQuestLogIndexByID(6544) a,b,c,d,e,f,g,h,j=GetQuestLogTitle(i) if g==-1 then SelectQuestLogEntry(i) SetAbandonQuest(i) AbandonQuest(i) end
i=GetQuestLogIndexByID(6641) a,b,c,d,e,f,g,h,j=GetQuestLogTitle(i) if g==-1 then SelectQuestLogEntry(i) SetAbandonQuest(i) AbandonQuest() end
for i=1,GetNumTradeSkills() do a,b,c,d,e,f=GetTradeSkillInfo(i) if strmatch(a,'Smelt Copper') then DoTradeSkill(i,1) end end
for i=1,GetNumTradeSkills() do a,b,c,d,e,f=GetTradeSkillInfo(i) if strmatch(a,'Smelt Tin') then DoTradeSkill(i,1) end end
for i=1,GetNumTradeSkills() do a,b,c,d,e,f=GetTradeSkillInfo(i) if strmatch(a,'Smelt Bronze') then DoTradeSkill(i,1) end end
for i=1,GetNumTradeSkills() do a,b,c,d,e,f=GetTradeSkillInfo(i) if strmatch(a,'Smelt Silver') then DoTradeSkill(i,1) end end
